items.headline: U.S. stock futures fall, gold hits record ahead of Fed meeting, Big Tech earnings
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures slumped and gold hit a record high Sunday as investors look ahead to a Fed interest-rate decision and Big Tech earnings this week.

items.headline: About 20,000 U.S. flights have been canceled due to the winter storm — and counting
items.summary_en: Airlines have canceled about 20,000 flights due to a winter storm expected to wallop two-thirds of the U.S. over the weekend — with hubs in Dallas and Atlanta among the most affected.

items.headline: ‘I need protein shakes’: Couples disagree about panic-buying for this weekend’s snowstorm
